title: WatchTron watch face
summary: Use the WatchTron watch face and change the style of your Android Wear device.
description: WatchTron is a minimalistic design that combines two opposite  geometric elements, on the one side square and angular time information marks and on the other a round shape is used to arrange the distribution of the time elements. The color design is based on the same principle, sober black and white scale elements are combined with colorfull watch arrows.This watch face can be used on both round and square watches.
descriptionHTML:
WatchTron is a minimalistic design that combines two opposite geometric elements, on the one side square and angular time information marks and on the other a round shape is used to arrange the distribution of the time elements. The color design is based on the same principle, sober black and white scale elements are combined with colorfull watch arrows.

This watch face can be used on both round and square watches.
